alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:35PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 600 PM MST... At 535 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claypool, or near Globe, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 243 and 269. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 255. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 214 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
